definitions.definition: A tall, tropical Asian perennial herb , Boehmeria nivea , cultivated for its fibrous stems .
The fibre extracted from this plant known especially for its ability to hold shape, reduce wrinkling, and introduce a silky lustre used to make textiles, fishing nets, upholstery, etc.

main_definition: ( usually countable ) A tall, tropical Asian perennial herb , Boehmeria nivea , cultivated for its fibrous stems .
secondary_definitions: ( usually uncountable ) The fibre extracted from this plant known especially for its ability to hold shape, reduce wrinkling, and introduce a silky lustre used to make textiles, fishing nets, upholstery, etc.
